abstract: Google buys Invite Media and Hearst acquires iCrossing.
snippet: Google buys Invite Media and Hearst acquires iCrossing.
lead_paragraph: Deal-wise along Madison Avenue, it is not quite back to the frenzied buy-up days before the financial crisis. But two acquisitions announced on Thursday indicate that there is a quickening pace of deal-making as the economy seems to improve — particularly deals in the digital realm, which retained most of its allure even in the recent downturn.

headline.main: Google and Hearst Make Digital Acquisitions
